Define Documentation

#define DLSYM ( prefix,
sym,
func   ) 
Value:
do {                                                            \
                char _fname[64];                                        \
                snprintf(_fname, sizeof(_fname), "%s_%s", prefix, #func); \
                sym->func = (typeof(sym->func))dlsym(sym->dl_handle, _fname); \
        } while (0)

struct module_backfs_ops* load_backfs_module ( enum ldd_mount_type  mount_type  )  [read]

Load plugin for a given mount_type from ${pkglibdir}/mount_osd_FSTYPE.so and return struct of function pointers (will be freed in unloack_backfs_module).

Parameters:
[in] mount_type Mount type to load module for.
Return values:
Value of backfs_ops struct
NULL if no module exists
